Package men.brakh

Class RotatingSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • men.brakh.RotatingSquare
  • public class RotatingSquare
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Allows you to encrypt and decrypt messages using a cipher Roating Square
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pankratiew Alexandr

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String decode​(java.lang.String ciphertext)
      Decrypt a string (LENGTH OF LINE SHOULD BE MULTIPLICITY OF LEN^2 (default: 16)) using the rotating square method

      • RotatingSquare

        public RotatingSquare​(int[][] key)
        A class constructor
        Parameters:
        key - The array of "holes" in the square of the format [ [x,y], [x,y], ..]. Example: {{0,0}, {3,1}, {2,2}, {1,3}}
